titles.title: Children's Vaccine Initiative Amendments Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the development of a single vaccine to provide lifelong immunization against common childhood diseases.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E52)

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Children's Vaccine Initiative Amendments Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the National Institutes of Health to develop a single-dose, multiple-antigen compound vaccine that can be easily administered to children under age six and that will provide lifelong immunization against common childhood diseases. Authorizes appropriations.
